column4: i am using wallpaper tray package and i want that it should load automatically whenever i login , does ny body have ny solution
currently everytime i login i have to start it manually
ok nubbie can u tell me where this wallpaper tray program is stored
i mean in which i can find the executable wallpaper tray
yes decay
the command is "wallpaper-tray", you don't need to know where it is
to find out type: which wallpaper-tray
indeed, but you only need the command name "wallpaper-tray" is my point, it is already in your $PATH
look in /usr/share/doc/wallpaper-tray/README for a start
guess not, it's a pretty specific question. try searching ubuntuforums.org or google
those messages from ubotu meant to NOT keep repeating your question
try asking in #ubuntu-in
type who, they might both be you
http://www.google.com/support/talk/bin/answer.py?answer=24073&topic=1415
i tried that but not working
i want to use gaim, i dont have pidgin
it should be identical for gaim
but in gaim there is no XMpp protocol
ah ok, try this: Protocol Jabber, User ID user@gmail.com (including @gmail.com), server talk.google.com, port 5223
its not working the website you asked me to see
also in the advanced tab where you change the port to 5223, check the 2 checkboxes
ok
its not connecting
